thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Man United boss Jose Mourinho aiming to land Chelsea's WIllian in the summer
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Man United boss Jose Mourinho aiming to land Chelsea's WIllian in the summer

title: EXCLUSIVE: Man United boss Jose Mourinho aiming to land Chelsea's WIllian in the summer
text:
GETTY Willian won Chelsea's Best Player last season after being the only standout player 
The Brazilian has confirmed his former boss at Stamford Bridge tried to lure him to Manchester United at the start of the season. 
Asked who had tried to sign him, he said the offer was from “Manchester United, because Mourinho is there too.” 
He gave no further details but Starsport understands Mourinho will test the water again in the next transfer window. 
The 28-year-old was easily Chelsea ’s best-performing player under the Portuguese coach last season prior to his axing in December. 
But the club’s player of the year has found himself playing second fiddle to a revitalised Pedro on the right of Antonio Conte’s three-man attack this season. 
He admitted to finding it tough being left out, saying: “No player likes to start the game at the bank. The 20 worst Manchester United signings Friday, 20th January 2017 MEMPHIS DEPAY has moved to Lyon after a disastrous spell at Manchester United - but where does he rank among their worst signings? 1 / 21 GETTY The 20 worst Manchester United signings 
“To be honest, I do not like it either. I like to be playing all the time.” 
Willian could be more receptive to an Old Trafford switch in the summer if he continues to be frozen out. 
But Chelsea will take some serious persuading to sell to one of their major rivals, although an offer in the region of £40m might persuade them to the negotiating table. 
And there is a precedent, with Juan Mata moving from West London to Manchester for £37m just over three years ago. Related articles
